name: Merfolk

actions.name: Trident
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +2 to hit  reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft.  one target. Hit: 4 (1d8) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack  or 3 (1d6) piercing damage if thrown.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The merfolk can breathe air and water.

document__title: Level Up Advanced 5e Monstrous Menagerie OGL
